item.title: MacBook Setup Using Ansible and Homebrew
item.description: The Problem: You have a brand new fresh install of OSX on your MacBook and you need to get up and running. You want all your apps installed using Homebrew & Cask and OSX setup with goodies like zsh and .dotfiles. The solution: Use Ansible to deploy CLI apps via Homebrew and GUI Apps via Cask. Then have Ansible setup the shell with zsh and .dotfiles that are pulled from a GitHub repo.
